channel.title: | Verprex Release | 100% Random PVP Drops | Custom PvP World | PERFECT Switching
channel.description:
Download Link: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ald4lzsv1z9cup1[/url] Client & Cache: Just use Vistex v7 as it was the base for this.
Links for the Client & Cache can be found here. [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/426658-vistex-v7-flawless-switches-perfect-curses-nex-ffa-minigame-more.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/426658-vistex-v7-flawless-switches-perfect-curses-nex-ffa-minigame-more.html[/url]
[size=14pt]Advertisement Thread:[/size] [center][img]http://verprex.org/screenies/Logo.png[/img]
This thread took me over an hour to create, hope you guy's like it. I tried my best. :)
[img]http://verprex.org/screenies/information.png[/img]
So i've been playing Pk servers viewing what people like so i can have ideas to code & add content my own source as a Based Pk source & i have never seen a PI server thats like Legacy614. 614's are Very buggy and laggy + glitchy if it's not well coded but i wanted to do something differen't so thats when i started working on this Pk based server from a 317 source & i pretty much changed the whole Pk system into a look alike of Legacy614, you can read the features to know what i mean, anyways. So i've been working on this source for quiet a while now & now i have JUST put it online for the Public to play!
Please note, this server is updated everyday so if their is something you don't like or would like added to the forums suggest it on the forums. I always read them i promse. :rolleyes:
Website: [url=http://Www.Verprex.Org]Verprex - Index[/url] Play Now: [url=http://verprex.org/forums/index.php?page=webclient]Webclient[/url] Client Download [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]http://verprex.org/Verprex.jar[/url]
Virus Scan [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/2379/2a7d4fea66ff471daab4e34.png[/img]
[img]http://verprex.org/screenies/features.png[/img]
• All Weapon Specials 100% • PERFECT Switching • Near Perfect Combat • Pk Title Shops • Grand exchange home FunPk • Tokkul currency • Tokkul Shop • 1 Tokkul per kill • Active Pking • Custom Pk System • Legacy614 Look Alike • Daily Updates • Perfect Amazing Forums • Custom Webclient • Custom 100% Working PvP Drops • Custom Anti-Farming System • Custom PvP World • Custom FunPk Multi Zone • Donator Crown Support • All Pvp Armours & Weapons 100% • All Nex Armours 100% With Effect • No Lag • VPS Hosted • Custom Interfaces • Symbols (<>^\) Support • Better graphics • Spawn Tab • Interactive Quest Tab • All Dungeoneering Items + Effects • Spawn Server • Much More!
[img]http://verprex.org/screenies/pictures.png[/img]
Starter Gear [img]http://verprex.org/screenies/2.png[/img]
Commands you are able to use. [img]http://verprex.org/screenies/8.png[/img]
This is home at grand exchange, you don't loose items when you Pk here. [img]http://verprex.org/screenies/1.png[/img]
This is multi pk zone, you also don't loose items here. [img]http://verprex.org/screenies/6.png[/img]
This is my Custom PvP Drop system, you 3 random drops each kill. [img]http://verprex.org/screenies/7.png[/img]
This is the Tokkul shop, you get Tokkuls for killing players & you spend them in here OR you can gamble them to a dicer & have a chance to double your bank! [img]http://verprex.org/screenies/3.png[/img]
This shop is used for the same above ^ but you must be a donator to purchase these with Tokkuls. (These are not Donator Only items, any player can use it.) [img]http://verprex.org/screenies/4.png[/img]
This is the Pk Titles shop, depending on how many people you've killed you can get pretty much any Pk Title you want. [img]http://verprex.org/screenies/5.png[/img][/center]

But most of them are costumes.

This thread took me over an hour to create, hope you guy’s like it.

So i’ve been playing Pk servers viewing what people like so i can have ideas to code & add content my own source as a Based Pk source & i have never seen a PI server thats like Legacy614. 614’s are Very buggy and laggy + glitchy if it’s not well coded but i wanted to do something differen’t so thats when i started working on this Pk based server from a 317 source & i pretty much changed the whole Pk system into a look alike of Legacy614, you can read the features to know what i mean, anyways.
